entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Warn/throw when non-deterministic split query may return wrong results #26808
  • Altering a nullable column to be not nullable with a default value fails during migration #26807
  • Fix issues raised by static analysis #26805
    MQ
  • Unexpected decimal CAST to decimal(18,2) #26804
  • Adding graph of entries to already filled ChangeTracker #26803
  • DatabaseGeneratedOption.Identity not setting Identity = true in SQL #26802
  • [EF6.0, Firebird] Problem with NorthwindIncludeQueryTestBase.Repro9735 #26801
  • Update optional dependents message to indicate non-null value rather than non-default #26800
  • Improve experience for data binding and graphical interfaces #26799
    7.0.0
  • Modernize EF Core tooling #26798
    7.0.0
  • Improve change tracking and update performance #26797
    7.0.0
  • Improve performance in the TechEmpower composite score #26796
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Can't concat/union two IQueryable<> of types inherited from one parent #26762
  • [Q] SqlServerConventionSetBuilder and valueGenerationConvention [SqlServerValueGenerationConvention] #26789
  • Cannot add new migrations in .NET 6 EF Core #26673

PullRequests

Created

  • Automatic refactorings based on static analysis of EFCore project #26806

Merged

  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.core from 2.0.6 to 2.0.7 #26786
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_sqlite3 from 2.0.6 to 2.0.7 #26788
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlite3 from 2.0.6 to 2.0.7 #26785
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_e_sqlcipher from 2.0.6 to 2.0.7 #26787
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump SQLitePCLRaw.bundle_winsqlite3 from 2.0.6 to 2.0.7 #26784
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • Fix ValueGenerated On Add Or Update, , make ValueGeneratedOnUpdate() and ValueGeneratedOnAddOrUpdate() working #26713
  • Call sync connection close instead of async #26793
    Servicing-approved, 6.0.2
  • Suppress warnings on uninitialized DbSet properties #26795
  • [release/2.1] Move off expiring machine pools #26794
    area-infrastructure
  • [6.0.x] Fix to #26451 - Temporal Table: Owned Entities support #26526
    Servicing-consider
  • Don't discover navigations to Dictionary<> and non-owned STETs #26769
